name: TrackLab Container
postCreateCommand: export UV_HTTP_TIMEOUT=300 && uv venv --clear --python 3.12  && uv pip install torch==2.6 torchvision==0.21 torchaudio --index-url https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple && uv pip install -e . --index-url https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple && echo 'source /workspaces/tracklab/.venv/bin/activate' >> ~/.bashrc && git config --global user.email ornot2008@yahoo.com && git config --global user.name ornot-devcontainer
